name: Revive (Aman)
description:
Story: Help our hero to change his past by undoing all his bad things which he had done in his past...  Controls:

 A and D or arrow keys to move left and Right, Space to Jump  , and E to invisible , Up arrow use Jet Pack and 1 , 2 , 3 keys to select weapon...

A game by Aman and his team.. Programmer:

AI : Aman

Visual : Pulkit

UI : Ashutosh

Art
  • Created by RAI
  • Visual Effects by Pulkit
Music
  • Effects by Moodies
  • Background Music by RoseSoup
